description.value: Varculaks are immune to disease, and they neither breathe nor suffer the normal environmental effects of being in a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.BWuAh3NeW0Dcnjon]{vacuum}. They gain a +2 species bonus to saving throws against ability damage, ability drain, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleed}, death effects, energy drain, exhaustion, fatigue, negative levels, paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning. In addition, effects that heal the living heal varculaks. A varculak needs to eat and drink.

modifiers.name: Deathless Vitality
modifiers.notes: Varculaks gain a +2 species bonus to saving throws against ability damage, ability drain,  Bleed, death effects, energy drain, exhaustion, fatigue, negative levels, paralysis, poison, sleep, and stunning.
